html: Today, @RepCasten and I spoke on the Floor in support of our bipartisan Resolution, which passed overwhelmingly. It is time to empower community partnerships and law enforcement in their work to safeguard seniors against deception and scams. More here:https://johnrose.house.gov/media/press-releases/rose-casten-bipartisan-resolution-support-combating-financial-exploitation …
text: Today, @RepCasten and I spoke on the Floor in support of our bipartisan Resolution, which passed overwhelmingly. It is time to empower community partnerships and law enforcement in their work to safeguard seniors against deception and scams. More here:https://johnrose.house.gov/media/press-releases/rose-casten-bipartisan-resolution-support-combating-financial-exploitation …

html: Age brings many of life’s most difficult challenges, but financial exploitation should not be one of them.
text: Age brings many of life’s most difficult challenges, but financial exploitation should not be one of them.

html: It is time to equip our friends, families, and neighbors with the knowledge and tools they need to guard against the heartbreak of their hard-earned security and stability being stolen in the golden years of life. #financialliteracy
text: It is time to equip our friends, families, and neighbors with the knowledge and tools they need to guard against the heartbreak of their hard-earned security and stability being stolen in the golden years of life. #financialliteracy

html: Tune in to @cspan now to hear my remarks on the House Floor regarding the importance of financial literacy for #TN6 seniors.

html: I am thankful for the quick action by South Cumberland Elementary School’s school resource officers and local law enforcement in protecting Cumberland County students. I commend their vigilance and will continue to monitor this story as more information is made available.
text: I am thankful for the quick action by South Cumberland Elementary School’s school resource officers and local law enforcement in protecting Cumberland County students. I commend their vigilance and will continue to monitor this story as more information is made available.

html: My heart goes out to the victims and families of this weekend’s senseless murders in Sumner County. I will be praying for the families involved and will be closely watching reports from the TBI and Sheriff Weatherford.
text: My heart goes out to the victims and families of this weekend’s senseless murders in Sumner County. I will be praying for the families involved and will be closely watching reports from the TBI and Sheriff Weatherford.

html: Today, we asked our fellow Members of Congress to give us a chance to vote to protect life, to end infanticide, and to make sure that when babies are born alive they have the same chance at life that Guy is enjoying. It’s time to #EndInfanticide.https://youtu.be/h_yUf6ETh8c
text:
Today, we asked our fellow Members of Congress to give us a chance to vote to protect life, to end infanticide, and to make sure that when babies are born alive they have the same chance at life that Guy is enjoying.

It’s time to #EndInfanticide.https://youtu.be/h_yUf6ETh8c

text:
ICYMI: I voted against Speaker Pelosi’s latest attempt to terminate @POTUS's ability to declare a national emergency at our southern border.  I stand with the people of #TN6 in our shared desire to fully secure our border.

html: Thank you @POTUS for leading the fight to #BuildTheWall, #StandForLIfe, and empower #JobCreation. Our #StateoftheUnion is strong and I will continue to work every day for prosperity in our country and #TN06. #SOTU
text: Thank you @POTUS for leading the fight to #BuildTheWall, #StandForLIfe, and empower #JobCreation. Our #StateoftheUnion is strong and I will continue to work every day for prosperity in our country and #TN06. #SOTU

html: With 304,000 jobs created last month alone, we know @POTUS is placing hard working Americans first. I will stand with @POTUS to continue job creation, tax reform, and policies that promote economic prosperity for #TN06 and our country! #Jobs #SOTU
text: With 304,000 jobs created last month alone, we know @POTUS is placing hard working Americans first. I will stand with @POTUS to continue job creation, tax reform, and policies that promote economic prosperity for #TN06 and our country! #Jobs #SOTU

html: President Trump is committed to solving the infrastructure crisis, which is crippling communities across the country. I will stand with @POTUS as a strong advocate for #TN06 for roads and other infrastructure. #SOTU
text: President Trump is committed to solving the infrastructure crisis, which is crippling communities across the country. I will stand with @POTUS as a strong advocate for #TN06 for roads and other infrastructure. #SOTU

html: Tonight, the Corcoran family, from East TN, is here at the #SOTU. Our hearts are with them as we remember their son, Pierce, whose life was tragically taken by an illegal immigrant. We must stand with @POTUS to end these senseless tragedies. #AngelFamilies #BorderSecurity
text: Tonight, the Corcoran family, from East TN, is here at the #SOTU. Our hearts are with them as we remember their son, Pierce, whose life was tragically taken by an illegal immigrant. We must stand with @POTUS to end these senseless tragedies.  #AngelFamilies #BorderSecurity

html: As long as we do not have a wall on our southern border, every state is a border state. It is far past time to end the flow of illegal drugs and criminals into our country. I stand with @POTUS and will work with him to #BuildTheWall #SOTU
text: As long as we do not have a wall on our southern border, every state is a border state. It is far past time to end the flow of illegal drugs and criminals into our country. I stand with @POTUS and will work with him to #BuildTheWall #SOTU

html: In recent days, we have tragically witnessed other states terminating protections for the unborn but in #TN06 we believe every life matters. Thank you @POTUS for standing strong for life! #TennesseeValues #SOTU
text: In recent days, we have tragically witnessed other states terminating protections for the unborn but in #TN06 we believe every life matters. Thank you @POTUS for standing strong for life! #TennesseeValues #SOTU

html: We’re out of Nashville today and the first stop was Van Buren Co. We caught up with a great crowd about my first two weeks in office, my plans for rural TN, and improving access to vocational and technical education. Big day ahead in Chattanooga and Kingsport.pic.twitter.com/pnge3cs9rN

html: Today, #WeRemember the innocent men, women, and children whose lives were taken by evil. We must also remember the people who stood up for what was right and fought for liberation. May we never forget to stand up for what is right and for the innocent. #HolocaustRemembranceDay
text:
Today, #WeRemember the innocent men, women, and children whose lives were taken by evil. We must also remember the people who stood up for what was right and fought for liberation. May we never forget to stand up for what is right and for the innocent.
#HolocaustRemembranceDay

html: I’ve said that rural TN is one of my top priorities. html: Today, on #MLKDay, we reflect on the life and work of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. He reminded us that, "Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'" As a nation, may we honor him by service to others, advancing unity, and upholding justice.
text:
Today, on #MLKDay, we reflect on the life and work of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.

He reminded us that, "Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'"

As a nation, may we honor him by service to others, advancing unity, and upholding justice.

html: Two years ago @realdonaldtrump was inaugurated as @POTUS. What a great two years it has been! I'll continue to work with him to put America first.
text: Two years ago @realdonaldtrump was inaugurated as @POTUS. What a great two years it has been! I'll continue to work with him to put America first.

html: “It is a great honor to give Tennesseans a voice on the Financial Services Committee.” Congressman Rose is among the first to be named to one of only a few “A” committees in the House’s “A, B, and C” committee system. text:
“It is a great honor to give Tennesseans a voice on the Financial Services Committee.”

Congressman Rose is among the first to be named to one of only a few “A” committees in the House’s “A, B, and C” committee system.

Full statement here:https://johnrose.house.gov/media/press-releases/newly-elected-john-rose-appointed-top-tier-committee …

html: .@RepJohnRose has decided to withhold his pay saying in-part. “I will not accept my congressional pay until those who are furloughed from the shutdown, through no fault of their own, are again able to receive their pay."https://twitter.com/mchightower/status/1082788202249969666 …
text: .@RepJohnRose has decided to withhold his pay saying in-part. “I will not accept my congressional pay until those who are furloughed from the shutdown, through no fault of their own, are again able to receive their pay."https://twitter.com/mchightower/status/1082788202249969666 …

html: I support President Trump’s vision for securing our southern border and will vote to build the wall. Additionally, I will not accept my congressional pay until those who are furloughed from the shutdown are again able to receive their pay. #TN6https://johnrose.house.gov/media/press-releases/rose-statement-border-wall-funding-and-government-shutdown …
text: I support President Trump’s vision for securing our southern border and will vote to build the wall.
